description: [Andariel](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0138) has exploited numerous ActiveX vulnerabilities, including zero-days.(Citation: FSI Andariel Campaign Rifle July 2017)(Citation: IssueMakersLab Andariel GoldenAxe May 2017)(Citation: TrendMicro New Andariel Tactics July 2018)

external_references.description: FSI. (2017, July 27). Campaign Rifle - Andariel, the Maiden of Anguish. Retrieved September 29, 2021.
IssueMakersLab. (2017, May 1). Operation GoldenAxe. Retrieved September 29, 2021.
Chen, Joseph. (2018, July 16). New Andariel Reconnaissance Tactics Uncovered. Retrieved September 29, 2021.
